reference_summary:
TAKIYA 72pcs Mixed Assorted Style Full Cover Acrylic False Artificial Nail Tips (3 Boxes，Not Includes Glue)
{'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.06 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 2.54 Ounces'}
These are very thin and cheap. Even the designs rub off within a day or two. When I wore the first pair pair I thought it might just be a fluke that they kept breaking off and the design came off. So, I tried a second set. The same thing happened. Just tossed the 3rd set.
Don't waste you money!
Kiss Gel Fantasy Ready-to-Wear Gel 24 Nails KGN53 Olivia (2 Pack)
KISS
{'Size': '2 Pack', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'KISS', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 4.53 x 1.89 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Ivy Enterprises, Inc.'}
Great nails. The best brand I have found. I wear them all of the time. If taken care of they will last about a week. I have found that if you put a top coat or clear polish on top the color doesn't wear off the tips as much adding to the lasting color. I used to do my own nails but got tired of having to wait for the polish to dry especially when in a hurry. These you can put a drop or so of glue and they stay on without damaging your nails. I wear gloves when I do the dishes and clean so they last long. I get compliments all of the time.
Great nails!
YVVO Fake Nails Nail Art Manicure - Full Cover Short Pattern Violet False Nails with Rotating Solution pressure Pink Diamond Clover Decor - Complete Nail Beauty Trimmer/File/Glue/Cleaner Cotton Pads S
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.31 x 0.83 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '634923438611'}
These are beautiful! And the case they come in is really nice and can be used again and again!
Beautiful Nails!
Gold Finger Full Cover Nails Gel Glam Ready to Wear Gel Manicure Long Nails (2 PACK)
KISS

These are just as bright as in the pictures which I absolutely love! Excellent quality! Will be ordering again!!
Beautiful Nails!
Kiss Glam Fantasy Medium Length Matte Navy Blue Nails KGF06

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to favor artificial nails, with a strong tendency towards creative designs and medium coverage options. Their recent purchase highlights their ongoing appreciation for vibrant aesthetics, although they noted a slight discrepancy in color representation.

- **Quality Concern**: The user remains committed to high-quality products, consistently opting for brands known for durability and superior craftsmanship. Their experiences with the KISS brand reinforce this preference.

- **Style Dislike**: The user's aversion to products that wear quickly continues, as they seek a blend of aesthetic appeal and performance integrity in their choices.

- **Frustration with Performance**: While frustrations with lower-quality products were previously noted, the user now demonstrates a well-informed perspective on brands, fostering confidence in their selections.

- **Rating Behavior**: The user tends to rate high-quality products positively, as evidenced by their recent review, where they expressed satisfaction while noting minor issues with color vibrancy.

- **Buying Caution**: The user maintains a cautious approach to purchases but is showing increased assurance in selecting reliable brands, reflecting a growing familiarity with product performance based on past positive experiences.

Overall, the user's behavior underscores their pursuit of quality and durability in beauty products, complemented by a preference for innovative designs that align with their high standards.
